pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - EmeraldIsle Resort EmeraldIsle HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy We are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy outlines how EmeraldIsle Resort collects, uses, discloses, and safeguards your personal information when you visit our website or use our services. 1. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a reservation or booking with us. 2. Use of Information We use the information we collect to process reservations, communicate with you, improve our services, and send promotional offers with your consent. 3. Disclosure of Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties, including service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing our services. 4. Data Security We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. 5. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also withdraw consent for processing your data at any time, where applicable. 6. Changes to This Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated effective date. The EmeraldIsle website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
